title: #97 - Jack Black & Kyle Gass (Tenacious D)
description: On this episode of The H3 Podcast we are joined by the greatest band in the history of all music ever- Tenacious D! Together we discuss latkes, circumcision, their origins with the Mr. Show crew, Jack mentoring Justin Roiland, and  SO much more! Jack and Kyle's new animated feature film and album, Post-Apocalypto, are available now! You can watch Post-Apocalypto free on https://tenaciousd.com/
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
